Message:
Demons are trying
to destroy the world.

So, under the orders of
our angel lord, Samyaza,
we set out on a journey
to stop them.

We were given the noble mission
of saving the world.
Failure was not an option.

And yet...Morgana and Elaine were
acting like they were on vacation,

with the usually serious Myrlennia
and Guinevere also in high spirits.

Even the two Heroes said
they’d rather us have fun than
tense up and make mistakes.

Bonds are the only power that
can stand up to the demons.

That’s why we were all raised
together, just like a family.

Because of that, though,
we may have gotten
a bit too close...

Looks like it’s up to me to
get things done around here!
